description: yeehaa is a tech leader with extensive experience in digital innovation and technology strategy in Europe. Specializing in software development, data analytics, and project management, he has led various successful tech initiatives. Author of 'Across Space And Time,' advocating for decentralized organizational structures. Curator of 'Groom Your Ecosystem,' focusing on vision, adaptability, and creativity.
blurb: Ecosystem describes a biological community bound by space and time. Its metaphorical use signifies a shift towards decentralized structures. Ecosystem Architecture emerges as a new practice to cultivate thriving, dispersed organizations.
